main event: A round bright red object, approximately 40-50 feet in diameter, was sighted floating up and down below the horizon in Paradise, Michigan.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes., The object was reported to be floating gradually out of sight., Winds were from the northwest at high velocity during the sighting., The initial conclusion was that the object was probably a balloon., There are multiple references to insufficient data for evaluation in the report.
